roleset.name: put off until a later time

role.descr: delay itself, EXT, or new time

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The company is highlighting more special deals in its advertising and stores, and it-1's offering *trace*-1 to defer finance charges on certain big-ticket items.
example.arg: finance charges on certain big-ticket items

example.name: passive with new time
example.text: Although the company could see fourth-quarter revenue shrink by nearly $5 billion if it isn't able to deliver any more planes this year, [those dollars]-1 actually would just be deferred *trace*-1 until 1990.
example.arg: Although the company could see fourth-quarter revenue shrink by nearly $5 billion if it isn't able to deliver any more planes this year

example.name: deference
example.text: But dominant in the sense that every other objective , no matter how worthy intrinsically , must defer to it .

roleset.name: pass to

example.name: All args
example.text: [ I - 1} will have [* -1] to defer the timing of surgery to our cardiovascular surgery colleagues about when they would do his valve in order to proceed with our surgery once he has recovered
example.arg: about when they would do his valve
in order to proceed with our surgery once he has recovered.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: [rectal exam-1] deferred [*-1] to colon and rectal surgeon.

roleset.note: Based on temprel data. No comparison. No VNcls. Framed by Katie.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'defer' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
